QuestData.Title: Dreadpiston
QuestData.Description:
The Iron Horde overtook a peaceful draenei outpost without mercy.
They used a machine they call Dreadpiston to level the town in minutes.
Destroy it.
QuestData.CompletionText: Mercy is no longer an option against this enemy.
QuestData.RewardText: They will not use that machine to kill any more draenei. Thank you, $n.
